accountId.description: A unique ID of the account adhering to the standards for ID permanence

currentBalance.description: The balance of the account at this time. Should align to the balance available via other channels such as Internet Banking. Assumed to be negative if the customer has money owing

availableBalance.description: Balance representing the amount of funds available for transfer. Assumed to be zero or positive

creditLimit.description: Object representing the maximum amount of credit that is available for this account. Assumed to be zero if absent

amortisedLimit.description: Object representing the available limit amortised according to payment schedule. Assumed to be zero if absent

currency.description: The currency for the balance amounts. If absent assumed to be AUD

purses.description: Optional array of balances for the account in other currencies. Included to support accounts that support multi-currency purses such as Travel Cards
